short_summary: This is a tender to perform an analysis of capelin age and otolith microchemistry.  The scope of the work is as follows: ...
description: The scope of the work includes analyzing 1200 pairs of capelin otoliths, with 600 pairs in 2022 and 600 pairs in 2023, and an optional third year in 2024. The Contractor will determine the age of the fish and perform microchemistry analysis.
